questions.question_text: AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) is organized into how many perspectives?
If an organisation needs to host their IT system on a dedicated resources due to compliance reason. Which cloud computing deployment model should be used?
Which of the following are direct benefits of server virtualization? (Select TWO)
What is the main benefit of server virtualization for cloud computing customers?

options.option_text: Virtualization allows cloud customers access to a wider range of software choices.
Virtualization allows cloud customers direct access to a wide range of compute choices.
Virtualization allows cloud customers greater server security.
Virtualization allows cloud customers more effective utilization of hardware resources.

questions.question_text: Which AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) perspective is relevant to a Finance Manager?
Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) is similar to
Which of the following best describes Infrastructure as a Service products?

options.option_text: Services that provide a service to end users through a public network
Services that give you direct control over underlying compute and storage resources
Services that hide infrastructure complexity behind a simple interface
Platforms that allow developers to run their code over short periods on cloud servers

questions.question_text: Which AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) perspective is relevant to Chief Technology Officer or CTO, IT managers, and solutions architects?
Which of the following best describes the cloud service model known as software as a service (SaaS)?

options.option_text: Abstracted interfaces built to manage clusters of containerized workloads
Customer rental of the use of measured units of a provider’s physical compute, storage, and networking resources
End user access to software applications delivered over the internet
Access to a simplified interface through which customers can directly deploy their application code without having to worry about managing the underlying infrastructure

questions.question_text: If there is a legacy system in a company that cannot be migrated due to compliance reason. Which cloud computing deployment model should be used?
Which of the following best describes the cloud service model known as infrastructure as a service (IaaS)?

options.option_text: Abstracted interfaces built to manage clusters of containerized workloads
Customer rental of the use of measured units of a provider’s physical compute, storage, and networking resources
End user access to software applications delivered over the internet
Access to a simplified interface through which customers can directly deploy their application code without having to worry about managing the underlying infrastructure

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes the cloud service model known as platform as a service (PaaS)?

options.option_text: Abstracted interfaces built to manage clusters of containerized workloads
Customer rental of the use of measured units of a provider’s physical compute, storage, and networking resources
End user access to software applications delivered over the internet
Access to a simplified interface through which customers can directly deploy their application code without having to worry about managing the underlying infrastructure

questions.question_text: AWS Elastic Load Balancing and Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) are similar to
Which of the following is a key component of operational excellence?

options.option_text: Making minor improvements to bad processes

questions.question_text: Which of the following contribute the most to Amazon’s ability to provide its cloud services at rates often below what they would cost locally? (Select TWO.)
Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) and Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances are similar to
Which of the following advantage is achieve in a cloud computing environment when a new IT resources are only a click away

options.option_text: Trade capital expense for variable expense

questions.question_text: If you need a lightweight cloud platform for a simple web application, which service is the most suitable?
When a company decided to migrate the IT system to the cloud and only pay for the amount of IT resources consumed, which advantage is the company capitalised on ?

options.option_text: Trade capital expense for variable expense

questions.question_text: If you want complete control over your AWS computing resources, which service is the most suitable?
Which of the following best describes Software as a Service products?

options.option_text: Platforms that allow developers to run their code over short periods on cloud servers
Services that provide a service to end users through a public network
Services that give you direct control over underlying compute and storage resources
Services that hide infrastructure complexity behind a simple interface

questions.question_text: AWS documentation is available in a number of formats, including which of the following? (Select TWO.)
If you want a service that deploys, manages, and scales your web applications for you, which service is the most suitable?
AWS security groups are similar to
Which of the following best describes Platform as a Service products?

options.option_text: Platforms that allow developers to run their code over short periods on cloud servers
Services that give you direct control over underlying compute and storage resources
Services that provide a service to end users through a public network
Services that hide infrastructure complexity behind a simple interface

questions.question_text: How does the metered payment model make many benefits of cloud computing possible? (Select TWO)

options.option_text: Full-stack applications are possible without the need to invest in capital expenses
Experiments with multiple configuration options are now cost-effective.
Greater application security is now possible.

questions.question_text: Which of the following does not contribute significantly to the operational value of a large cloud provider like AWS?

options.option_text: Highly experienced teams of security engineers
Deep experience in the retail sphere

questions.question_text: Which AWS Cloud Adoption Framework is not a technical capability?
What are some key benefits often available for applications run on a large cloud platform like AWS? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Improved turnaround for new application code releases

questions.question_text: Which of the following cloud advantage is because of usage from hundreds of thousands of customers is aggregated in the cloud, which translates into lower pay-as-you-go prices.

options.option_text: Trade capital expense for variable expense

questions.question_text: Your corporate website was offline last week for more than two hours— which caused serious consequences, including the early retirement of your CTO. Your engineers have been having a lot of trouble tracking down the source of the outage and admit that they need outside help. Which of the following will most likely meet that need?
AWS customers get full access to the AWS Trusted Advisor best practice checks when they subscribe to which support plan(s)?

options.option_text: All plans get this level of support

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes the Free Tier?

options.option_text: Free enterprise support setup service available for free through an account’s first 30 days
Full instances from core AWS services available for free through an account’s first 12 months
Light versions of most AWS services available for free through an account’s first 30 days
Light versions of most AWS services available for free through an account’s first 12 months

questions.question_text: The primary purpose of an AWS technical account manager is to:

options.option_text: Provide deployment guidance and advocacy for Enterprise Support customers
Provide strategic cost estimates for Enterprise Support customers
Provide 24/7 customer service for your AWS account
Provide deployment guidance and advocacy for Business Support customers

questions.question_text: Which of the following will probably not affect the pricing for an AWS service?

options.option_text: The volume of data saved to an S3 bucket
Requests for raising the available service limit
The volume of data egress from an Amazon Glacier vault

questions.question_text: What is the main goal for creating a Usage budget type (in AWS Budgets)?

options.option_text: To correlate usage per unit cost to understand your account cost efficiency
To track particular categories of resource consumption
To monitor costs being incurred against your account
To track the status of any active reserved instances on your account

questions.question_text: Your web development team is actively gearing up for a deployment of an ecommerce site. During these early stages of the process, individual developers are running into frustrating conflicts and configuration problems that are highly specific to your situation. Which of the following plans will provide the best blend of support and cost savings?
Which of the following is not an included parameter in the AWS Total Cost of Ownership?

options.option_text: Labor costs of an on-premises deployment
Networking costs of an on-premises deployment
Electricity costs of an on-premises deployment
The tax implications of a cloud deployment

questions.question_text: Your Linux-based EC2 instance requires a patch to a Linux kernel module. The problem is that patching the module will, for some reason, break the connection between your instance and data in an S3 bucket. Your team doesn’t know if it’s possible to work around this problem. Which is the most cost-effective AWS plan through which support professionals will try to help you?

options.option_text: No plan covers this kind of support

questions.question_text: Which of the following is not a setting you can configure in a Cost budget?
Your company is planning a major deployment on AWS. While the design and testing stages are still in progress, which of the following plans will provide the best blend of support and cost savings?
The AWS Free Tier is designed to give new account holders the opportunity to get to know how their services work without necessarily costing any money. How does it work?

options.option_text: You get free lightweight access to many core AWS services for a full 12 months.
You get service credits that can be used to provision and launch a few typical workloads.
You get full free access to a few core AWS services for one month.
You get low-cost access to many core AWS services for three months.

questions.question_text: What is the key difference between the roles of AWS Professional Services and a technical account manager (TAM)?

options.option_text: The Professional Services product is a network appliance that AWS installs in your data center to test cloud-bound workloads for compliance with best practices. The TAM is a cloud professional employed by AWS to guide you through the planning and execution of your infrastructure.

The Professional Services product helps AWS Partner Network cloud professionals work alongside your own team to help you administrate your cloud infrastructure. The TAM is a cloud professional employed by AWS to guide you through the planning and execution of your infrastructure.

The TAM is a member of your team designated as the point person for all AWS projects. The Professional Services product provides consultants to work alongside your own team to help you administrate your cloud infrastructure.

The TAM is a cloud professional employed by AWS to guide you through the planning and execution of your infrastructure. The Professional Services product provides cloud professionals to work alongside your own team to help you administrate your cloud infrastructure.

questions.question_text: Which of the following EC2 services can be used without charge under the Free Tier?

options.option_text: Any single EC2 instance type as long as it runs for less than 75 hours per month
Any single EC2 instance type as long as it runs for less than one hour per day
A single t2.micro EC2 instance type instance for 750 hours per month
t2.micro EC2 instance type instances for a total of 750 hours per month

questions.question_text: Which of these tools lets you design graphs within the browser interface to track your account spending?
Which Cost Explorer report shows the amount of money you’ve saved using reserved instances?

options.option_text: Monthly EC2 running hours costs and usage

questions.question_text: Which of the following Cost Explorer report types can show you the monthly costs for your reserved EC2 instances?
Which is the best place to get a quick summary of this month’s spend for your account?
Which of the following tools are available to ensure you won’t accidentally run past your Free Tier limit and incur unwanted costs? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: The Top Free Tier Services by Usage section on the Billing & Cost Management Dashboard
Billing & Cost Management section on the Top Free Tier Services Dashboard
Automated email alerts when activity approaches the Free Tier limits

questions.question_text: AWS customers receive “production system down” support within one hour when they subscribe to which support plan(s)?

options.option_text: All plans get this level of support

questions.question_text: Which of the following scenarios would be a good use case for AWS Organizations? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: A company with two distinct operational units, each with its own accounting system and AWS account
An organization that provides AWS access to large teams of its developers and admins
A single company with multiple AWS accounts that wants a single place to administrate everything
A company that’s integrated some operations with an upstream vendor

questions.question_text: Your company enrolled in the Developer Support plan and, through the course of one month, consumed $4,000 USD of AWS services. How much will the support plan cost the company for the month?
For which of the following will AWS provide direct 24/7 support to all users— even those on the Basic Support plan?

options.option_text: Help with accessing your infrastructure via the AWS CLI
Help with failed and unavailable infrastructure
Help with infrastructure under a massive denial-of-service (DoS) attack
Help with making a bill payment to AWS

questions.question_text: How does AWS ensure that no single customer consumes an unsustainable proportion of available resources?

options.option_text: AWS imposes default limits on the use of its service resources but allows customers to request higher limits.
AWS imposes default limits on the use of its services by Basic account holders; Premium account holders face no limits.
AWS allows customers to consume as much as they’re willing to pay for, regardless of general availability.
AWS imposes hard default limits on the use of its service resources.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is likely to be an accurate source of AWS pricing information?

options.option_text: The AWS Total Cost of Ownership Calculator
Wikipedia pages relating to a particular service
The AWS Command Line Interface (AWS CLI)
AWS online documentation relating to a particular service

questions.question_text: You want to experiment with deploying a web server on an EC2 instance. Which two of the following resources can you include to make that work while remaining within the Free Tier? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Two 20 GB solid-state Elastic Block Store (EBS) drive
A t2.micro instance type EC2 instance
A 30 GB solid-state Elastic Block Store (EBS) drive

questions.question_text: If an important functions of a business application is unavailable and the business is significantly impacted, which severity level will this be classified as?
Which of the following can help achieve cost optimization? (Select TWO.)
What is the purpose of cost allocation tags?

options.option_text: To help you identify resources for the purpose of tracking your account spending
To visually associate account events with billing periods
To help you identify the purpose and owner of a particular running resource to better understand and control deployments
To associate spend limits to automatically trigger resource shutdowns when necessary

questions.question_text: What is the main difference between the goals of Cost Explorer and of cost and usage reports?

options.option_text: Cost and usage reports are meant to alert you to malicious intrusions, while Cost Explorer displays visualizations of high-level historical and current account costs.
Cost Explorer lets you set alerts that are triggered by billing events, while cost and usage reports help you visualize system events.
Cost Explorer displays visualizations of high-level historical and current account costs, while cost and usage reports generate granular usage reports in CSV format.
Cost and usage reports display visualizations of high-level historical and current account costs, while Cost Explorer generates granular usage reports in CSV format.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AWS Total Cost of Ownership Calculator parameters is likely to have the greatest impact on cost?
Which of the following usage will always be cost-free even after your account’s Free Tier has expired? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: 500 MB/month of free storage on the Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR)
One million API calls/month on Amazon API Gateway
10 GB of data retrievals from Amazon Glacier per month
10 custom monitoring metrics and 10 alarms on Amazon CloudWatch

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a is a managed Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) protection service?
Which of the following design strategies is most effective for maintaining the reliability of a cloud application?
Which of the following provides a service that helps you track resource inventory and changes?
Which of the following best describes infrastructure redundancy?

options.option_text: Increasing the number of deployed resources to meet changing user demand
Maintaining copies of application data across multiple physical locations
Maintaining secure network connections to control incoming access
Increasing the size of deployed resources to meet changing user demand

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes infrastructure elasticity?

options.option_text: The presence of automated, pay-as-you-go access to new resources
Manually setting the number of deployed resources to meet changing user demand
Configuring applications to be easily resizable without manual intervention
Maintaining copies of application data across multiple physical locations

questions.question_text: You want to improve the resilience of your EC2 web server. Which of the following is the most effective and efficient approach?

options.option_text: Launch parallel, load-balanced instances in multiple Availability Zones within a single AWS Region
Launch parallel, auto scaled instances in multiple Availability Zones within a single AWS Region.
Launch parallel, load-balanced instances in multiple AWS Regions.
Launch parallel, auto scaled instances in multiple AWS Regions.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is regional service?
Which of the following characteristics most help AWS provide such scalable services? (Choose TWO)

options.option_text: The enormous number of servers it operates
The value of its capitalized assets
Its highly automated infrastructure administration systems

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the most accurate description of an AWS Availability Zone?

options.option_text: One or more independently powered data centers running a uniform hardware host typer
All the data centers located within a broad geographic area
The infrastructure running within a single physical data center
One or more independently powered data centers running a wide range of hardware host types

questions.question_text: While looking at the EC2 service console in the AWS Management Console while logged in as the root user, you notice all of your instances are missing. What could be the reason?

options.option_text: You don’t have an access key
You’ve selected the wrong Availability Zone in the navigation bar.
You’ve selected the wrong region in the navigation bar.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a key-value and document database that delivers single-digit millisecond performance at any scale, with built-in security, backup and restore, and in-memory caching.
What service does AWS use to provide a content delivery network (CDN) for its customers? (SELECT TWO)
Which of the following best describes infrastructure scalability?

options.option_text: Maintaining secure network connections to control incoming access
Configuring applications to be easily resizable without manual intervention
Maintaining copies of application data across multiple physical locations
Increasing the number of deployed resources to meet growing user demand

questions.question_text: Which of the following provides a way to establish a dedicated private network connection from your data center or office to AWS, which can reduce network costs and increase bandwidth throughput?
Which of the following best describes scalability?

options.option_text: The ability of an application to automatically add preconfigured compute resources to meet increasing demand
The ability to more densely pack virtualized resources onto a single physical server
The ability of an application to increase or decrease compute resources to match utilisation
The ability to bill resource usage using a pay-per-user mode

questions.question_text: Which of the following is global service?
Choice of a Region is typically based on (Choose Two)
Which of the following designations would refer to the AWS US West (Oregon) Region?
Which of the following is for data archiving and long-term backup?
Which of the following best describes elasticity?

options.option_text: The ability of an application to automatically add preconfigured compute resources to meet increasing demand
The ability to more densely pack virtualized resources onto a single physical server
The ability of an application to increase or decrease compute resources to match changing demand
The ability to bill resource usage using a pay-per-user model

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a MySQL and PostgreSQL-compatible relational database?
What are the most significant architectural benefits of the way AWS designed its Regions? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: It can make applications more compliant with local regulations
It can make applications available to end users with lower latency
It can make infrastructure more fault tolerant
It can bring down the price of running

questions.question_text: Which of the following are design approaches that can directly increase the performance reliability of your applications? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Run redundant resources in multiple Availability Zones
Locate resources geographically close to your users.
Incorporate Auto Scaling into your design.
Use a content distribution network (CDN) like CloudFront to cache your content

questions.question_text: Which of these is a designation for two or more AWS data centers within a single geographic area?
Why is it that most AWS resources are tied to a single Region?

options.option_text: Because security considerations are best served by restricting access to a single physical location
Because those resources are run on a physical device, and that device must live somewhere
Because access to any one digital resource must always occur through a single sign-on.
Because spreading them too far afield would introduce latency issues

questions.question_text: Which of the following are signs of a highly available application? (Select TWO)

options.option_text: Virtualized hypervisor-driven systems are deployed as mandated by company policy.
Spikes in user demand are met through automatically increasing resources.
Applications are protected behind multiple layers of security.
A failure in one geographic region will trigger an automatic failover to resources in a different region.

questions.question_text: Edge locations improve performance by
Which of the following is a is a scalable cloud Domain Name System (DNS)?
Which of the following allows user sign-up, sign-in, and access control to a web and mobile apps?
When you request a new virtual machine instance in EC2, your instance will automatically launch into the currently selected value of which of the following?
Which of the following describes the cloud design principle of scalability?

options.option_text: The ability to reduce production costs by spreading capital expenses across many accounts
The ability to automatically increase available compute resources to meet growing user demand
The ability to segment physical resources into multiple virtual partitions
The ability to route incoming client requests between multiple application servers

questions.question_text: Which of the following allows you to monitor resources and applications?
Which of the following is a is a fast content delivery network (CDN) service?
Which of the following is a service that enables customers to connect their Amazon Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs) and their on-premises networks to a single gateway?
According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, which of the following are responsibilities of AWS? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Patching OSs running on EC2 instances
Patching underlying virtualization software running in AWS data centers
Security of what’s in the cloud

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the Service Organization Controls (SOC) reports found on AWS Artifact?

options.option_text: They’re an official, ongoing risk-assessment profiler for AWS-based deployments.
They can be used to help you design secure and reliable credit card transaction applications.
They attest to AWS infrastructure compliance with data accountability standards like Sarbanes–Oxley.
They guarantee that all AWS-based applications are, by default, compliant with Sarbanes–Oxley standards.

questions.question_text: Which of the following credentials can you use to log into the AWS Management Console?
How, using security best practices, should your organization’s team members access your AWS account resources?

options.option_text: Only a single team member should be given any account access.
Ideally, resource access should occur only through the use of access keys.
Through the use of specially created users, groups, and roles, each given the fewest permissions necessary.
Through a jointly shared single account user who’s been given full account-wide permissions.

questions.question_text: What will IAM users with AWS Management Console access need to successfully log in?

options.option_text: Their account number and secret access key
Their username, account number, and a password
Their username, password, and secret access key

questions.question_text: What is an IAM role?

options.option_text: A set of permissions allowing access to specified AWS resources
Permissions granted an IAM user over specified AWS resources
A set of IAM users given permission to access specified AWS resources
Permissions granted a trusted entity over specified AWS resources

questions.question_text: You want to log every object downloaded from an S3 bucket in a specific region. You want to retain these logs indefinitely and search them easily. What’s the most cost-effective way to do this? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Stream CloudTrail logs to CloudWatch Logs.
Create a trail to log S3 data events.
Enable CloudTrail logging of global service events.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are requirements you can include in an IAM password policy? (Select THREE.)

options.option_text: Require at least one space or null character
Require at least one nonalphanumeric character
Require at least one uppercase letter

questions.question_text: What does KMS use to encrypt objects stored on your AWS account?
What will you need to provide for a new IAM user you’re creating who will use “programmatic access” to AWS resources?

options.option_text: An access key ID and secret access key

questions.question_text: How does multi-factor authentication work?

options.option_text: In addition to an access password, users also authenticate via a physical MFA device
Users authenticate using tokens sent to at least two MFA devices
Instead of an access password, users authenticate via a physical MFA device.
Users authenticate using a password and also either a physical or virtual MFA device.

questions.question_text: What’s the most cost-effective way to view and search only the last 60 days of management API events on your AWS account?
Which of the following steps should ideally be taken on behalf of an AWS account’s root user? (Select THREE.)
Which of the following tools should be used regularly to provide insight into who has access to your account resources?
Which of the following describes an IAM role?

options.option_text: An identity assumed by multiple users logging in (using passwords) to access one or more AWS resources
An identity assumed when a person uses a password to log in to access one or more AWS resources
An identity used by a process to perform an action against an AWS resource
An identity assigned the owner of an AWS account when the account is created

questions.question_text: Which of the following are valid third-party federated identity standards? (Choose Two)
How long will your session with the AWS Management Console remain active?
Which of the following authentication tools is most commonly used for programmatic or automated access to AWS resources?
Which of the following fall under the administration responsibility of Amazon rather than you (the customer)? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Data stored in customer accounts on AWS
Physical access to AWS data centers
Data lost through malicious penetration of an application’s defenses
The infrastructure powering AWS managed services

questions.question_text: Which of the following features of S3 improve the security of data you store in an S3 bucket? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: S3 removes public objects by default.
All objects are readable by all AWS users by default.
Objects in S3 are not public by default
By default, S3 removes ACLs that allow public read access to objects.

questions.question_text: Which of the following IAM policies is the best choice for the admin user you create in order to replace the root user for day-to-day administration tasks?
Which of the following standards governs AWS-based applications processing credit card transactions?
Which of the following is a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources?
Which of the following describes a methodology that protects your organization’s data when it’s on-site locally, in transit to AWS, and stored on AWS?
What role can the documents provided by AWS Artifact play in your application planning? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: They represent AWS infrastructure design policy.
They can provide insight into the networking and storage design patterns your AWS applications use.
They can help you confirm that your deployment infrastructure is compliant with regulatory standards.
They can provide insight into various regulatory and industry standards that represent best practices.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of using CloudTrail log file integrity validation?

options.option_text: It tells you how a CloudTrail log file has been tampered with.
It lets you assert that no CloudTrail log files have been deleted from S3.
It lets you assert that no CloudTrail log files have been deleted from CloudWatch.
It prevents unauthorized users from deleting CloudTrail log files.

questions.question_text: What text format does the credential report use?
What is the primary function of the AWS IAM service?
Which of the following describes managing user authentication through third-party authentication services?
Which of the following should you do to secure your AWS root user? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Assign the root user to the “admins” IAM group
Use the root user for day-to-day administration tasks.

questions.question_text: The AWS Shared Responsibility Model illustrates how AWS itself (as opposed to its customers) is responsible for which aspects of the cloud environment?

options.option_text: The operating systems run on EC2 instances
The redundancy and integrity of customer-added data
Data and configurations added by customers
The underlying integrity and security of AWS physical resources

questions.question_text: Which of the following will encrypt your data while in transit between your office and Amazon S3?
What’s the most efficient method for managing permissions for multiple IAM users?

options.option_text: Create roles based on IAM policies, and assign them to IAM users.
Assign users requiring similar permissions to IAM roles.
Assign IAM users permissions common to others with similar administration responsibilities.
Assign users requiring similar permissions to IAM groups.

questions.question_text: What information does the IAM credential report provide?

options.option_text: The current state of security of your IAM users’ access credentials
A record of failed password account login attempts
The current state of your account security settings
A record of API requests against your account resources

questions.question_text: Which of the following AWS resources cannot be encrypted using KMS?

options.option_text: Existing AWS Elastic Block Store volumes

questions.question_text: What is Amazon Cognito?

options.option_text: A service that permits processing and analyzing of real-time video and data streams
A service that can manage authentication and authorization for your public-facing AWS hosted applications
A service that automates the administration of authentication secrets used by your AWS resources

questions.question_text: According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, which of the following are responsibilities of the Customer? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Upgrades and patches to the operating system on the EC2 instance
Physical security of the data center

questions.question_text: According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, what’s the best way to define the status of the software driving an AWS managed service?

options.option_text: Everything associated with an AWS managed service is the responsibility of the customer.
Everything associated with an AWS managed service is the responsibility of AWS.
Whatever the customer can control (application code and/or configuration settings) is the customer’s responsibility.
Whatever is added by the customer (like application code) is the customer’s responsibility.

questions.question_text: How can federated identities be incorporated into AWS workflows? (Select TWO).

options.option_text: You can provide users authenticated through a third-party identity provider access to backend resources used by your mobile app.
You can use identities to guide your infrastructure design decisions.
You can provide admins authenticated through AWS Microsoft AD with access to a Microsoft SharePoint farm running on AWS.
You can use authenticated identities to import external data (like email records from Gmail) into AWS databases.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are examples of applying the principles of the least privilege or maximum security? (Select TWO)

options.option_text: Granting each AWS user their own IAM username and password
Creating a security group rule to deny access to unused ports

questions.question_text: How does AWS describe an isolated networking environment into which you can launch compute resources while closely controlling network access?
You want to provide private name resolution for two VPCs using the domain name company.pri. How many private hosted zones do you need to create?
Which of the following are valid origins for a CloudFront distribution? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: A private S3 bucket that you don’t have access to
A private S3 bucket that you own

questions.question_text: Which of the following are true of a default VPC? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: AWS creates a default VPC in each Availability Zone.
By default, each default VPC is available to one AWS account.
AWS creates a default VPC in each Region
A default VPC spans multiple Regions.

questions.question_text: Resources in a VPC need to be able to resolve internal IP addresses for other resources in the VPC. No one outside of the VPC should be able to resolve these addresses. Which of the following Route 53 resources can help you achieve this?
From where does CloudFront retrieve content to store for caching?
Which of the following are true regarding subnets? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: A subnet must have a CIDR that’s a subset of the CIDR of the VPC in which it resides.
A VPC must have at least two subnets.
A subnet spans multiple Availability Zones.
A subnet spans one Availability Zone

questions.question_text: What is the main purpose of Amazon Route 53?

options.option_text: Countering the threat of distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks
Protecting web applications from web-based threats
Managing domain name registration and traffic routing
Using the serverless power of Lambda to customize CloudFront behavior

questions.question_text: What’s the difference between a security group and a network access control list (NACL)? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: A security group operates at the subnet level.
A network access control list operates at the instance level.
A network access control list operates at the subnet level.
A security group operates at the instance level

What is Amazon’s Git-compliant version control service for integrating your source code with AWS resources?

options.option_text: The pricing is seldom updated and doesn’t accurately reflect current pricing.
You’re not able to specify specific configuration parameters.
Not all AWS services are included.
You can calculate resource use for only one service at a time.

questions.question_text: What authentication method will you use to access your AWS resources remotely through the AWS Command Line Interface (CLI)?
Which pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework places emphasis on making informed decisions on the backdrop of processed data?

An industry regulatory body requires a healthcare insurance company to administer cryptographic key management locally to ensure the safeguarding of sensitive patient data. How can the organization achieve this, given that all their workloads are in the cloud?
A group of non-tech savvy friends are looking to set up a website for an upcoming event at a cost-effective price, with a novice-friendly interface. Which AWS service is the most appropriate to use?

options.option_text: Use a pre-configured customizable Apache web server on an Amazon EC2 instance.
Download a pre-configured website on an EC2 instance from a third-party website generator.
Use AWS Marketplace to install a ready-made WordPress AMI.

questions.question_text: Which of the following options is TRUE for AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS)?

options.option_text: AWS DMS can migrate databases from on-premise to AWS.
AWS DMS can migrate databases from EC2 to Amazon RDS.
AWS DMS can migrate databases from AWS to on-premise.
AWS DMS can have Amazon Redshift and Amazon DynamoDB as target databases.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are benefits of the AWS's Relational Database Service (RDS)? Choose the 2 correct answers from the options below.

options.option_text: It allows you to store unstructured data
It allows you to store NoSQL data
DB owner can resize the capacity accordingly

questions.question_text: A company is deploying a new two-tier web application in AWS. The company wants to store their most frequently used data to improve the response time for the application. Which AWS service provides the caching solution for the company’s requirements?

options.option_text: MySQL Installed on two Amazon EC2 Instances in a single Availability Zone
Amazon RDS for MySQL with Multi-AZ

questions.question_text: A company wants to create standard templates for the deployment of their Infrastructure. Which AWS service can be used in this regard?
For heterogeneous database migrations from on-premise to AWS, which of the following services is used by AWS Database Migration Service?
Which of the following tools can be used to check service limits for resources launched within AWS Cloud Infrastructure?
Which of the following services can be used to automate application code deployment to Amazon EC2 instance?
Which of the below statements is incorrect with regards to the advantages of moving to cloud?

options.option_text: Benefit from massive economies of scale
Trade variable expense for capital expense
Stop spending money running and maintaining data centres

questions.question_text: Project team enhancing the security features of a banking application, requires implementing a threat detection service that continuously monitors malicious activities and unauthorized behaviors to protect AWS accounts, workloads, and data stored in Amazon S3. Which AWS services should the project team select?
The project team requires an AWS service that provides a filesystem simultaneously mounted from different instances of EC2. Which AWS service will satisfy this requirement?

options.option_text: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server

questions.question_text: While using IAM within AWS, they recommend a list of best practices to be used while managing Users & their permissions. Which of the IAM practices are best to be chosen? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Within AWS, services should use roles for accessing other services
Users should be provided both Passwords & Access keys within the AWS environment
An IAM user should be given default access to all services for being able to develop & deliver applications quickly
For cross account access it is best to share the Access Keys when one Account needs to access services of another Account
While creating an AWS Account, its best to create an IAM user & use that Account

questions.question_text: Which of the following services helps in governance, compliance, and risk auditing in AWS?

You want to create a stream processing solution to process and query real-time streaming data using a SQL-based solution. You are looking for the simplest approach available that AWS provides. What AWS service should you use?
_________________ automates the discovery of sensitive data at scale and lowers the cost of protecting your data using machine learning and pattern matching techniques.
Security and Compliance is a shared responsibility between AWS and the customer. Which amongst the below-listed options are AWS responsibilities? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Perform all the necessary security configuration and management tasks for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2).
Patch management of the guest OS and applications
Security of the data in the cloud

questions.question_text: In the AWS Well-Architected Framework, which of the following is NOT a Security design principle to design solutions in AWS?

options.option_text: Apply Security only at the edge of the network.
Protect Data at rest & in transit.

questions.question_text: Most up-to-the-minute information on AWS service availability could be determined from?
A start-up organization is using the cost explorer tool to view and analyze its costs and usage. Which of the below statements are correct with regards to the cost explorer tool? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Spot Instances to purchase are recommended
Data is available for up to the last 24 months.
Provides forecast of the likely spend for the next six months
Identifies areas that need further inquiry
Provides trends that you can use to understand your costs

questions.question_text: Which of the following support plans offer 24*7 technical support via phone, email, and chat access to Cloud Support Engineers? (Select TWO.)
Which of the following AWS managed database service provides processing power that is up to 5X faster than a traditional MySQL database?
What is the key difference between an availability zone and an edge location?

options.option_text: An availability zone is a grouping of AWS resources in a specific region. An edge location is a specific resource within the AWS region.
An availability zone is an isolated location within an AWS region, whereas an edge location will deliver cached content to the closest location to reduce latency.
Edge locations are used as control stations for AWS resources.

questions.question_text: When using On-Demand instances in AWS, which of the following is a false statement when it comes to the costing for the Instance?

options.option_text: You pay no upfront costs for the instance.
You are charged per second based on the hourly rate.
You pay for as much as you use.
You have to pay the termination fees if you terminate the instance.

questions.question_text: A website that I have designed On Premise has a consistent increase in traffic during certain occasions like Christmas & Thanksgiving. The first year saw a 20% average increase while the second year saw a 40% average increase. It is observed that every year I need to spend on new Servers which lie idle after usage. If I use AWS Cloud resources instead, the advantage that I will get is.

options.option_text: I no longer need to define Capacity upfront
I can go Global in minutes
I can save on costs due to the elastic nature of the cloud
I can increase speed & agility of my website

questions.question_text: Which of the following can be used to protect against DDoS attacks? Choose 2 answers from the options given below.

A client who has adopted AWS Cloud would like to ensure that his systems need to deliver continuous business value & improve supporting processes and procedures. Which design pillar will he need to focus for achieving this?
Which of the following storage options provides the option of Lifecycle policies that can be used to move objects to archive storage.
Your company wants to move an existing Oracle database to the AWS Cloud. Which of the following services can help facilitate this move?
Which AWS service provides a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability?
You have a mission-critical application that must be globally available at all times. If this is the case, which of the below deployment mechanisms would you employ?
In AWS, which security aspects are the customers' responsibility? Choose 3 answers from the options given below.

options.option_text: Controlling physical access to compute resources
Security Group and ACL (Access Control List) settings
Patch management on the EC2 instance’s operating system

questions.question_text: Your company is planning to pay for an AWS Support plan. They have the following requirements as far as the support plan goes: · 24x7 access to Cloud Support Engineers via email, chat & phone · Response time of less than 15 minutes for any business-critical system faults Which of the following plans will suffice to keep in mind the above requirement?
Which of the following features of Amazon RDS allows for better availability of databases? Choose the answer from the options given below.
Which of the following security services can be used to detect users’ personal credit card numbers from data stored in Amazon S3?
Which of the following are best practices when designing cloud-based systems? Choose 2 answers from the options below.

options.option_text: Use as many services as possible.

questions.question_text: You are planning on deploying a video-based application onto the AWS Cloud. Users across the world will access these videos. Which of the below services can help efficiently stream the content to the users across the globe?
Which of the below-mentioned services is equivalent to hosting virtual servers on an on-premises location?
Which of the AWS security services can be used to retrieve configuration changes made to AWS resources causing operational issues?
Which service can be used to create steps required to automate build, test and deployments for a web application?
Which AWS Cloud service helps in the quick deployment of resources which can use different programming languages such as .Net and Java?
Which of the below options cannot be used to upload archives to Amazon Glacier?
